thread.title: Trump Plans to Pardon Former Cheney Aide Scooter Libby

author: Peter Nicholas
title: Trump Plans to Pardon Former Cheney Aide Scooter Libby

organizations.name: trump plans to pardon former cheney aide scooter libby

text:
President Donald Trump intends to pardon a former top aide to Vice President Dick Cheney, I. Lewis “Scooter” Libby—a step that former President George W. Bush refused to take, a person familiar with the matter said Thursday.
Mr. Libby, now 67 years old, was convicted in 2007 of lying to a grand jury and obstructing justice in a case that involved the leaking of the identity of a CIA officer, Valerie Plame.

The...
